channel.title: GitHub on Mariatta
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub on Mariatta

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ GitHub Global Maintainer Summit 2021
item.description:
Snowy Village

I gave a talk about The Bots of CPython at GitHub Global Maintainer Summit. It was an online event, so I looked for local ice cream shops where I live.

Snowy Village is my kids favorite place here. They really love the bingsu, which is milk-based Korean shaved ice dessert.

Bingsu counts as ice cream! #IceCreamSelfie 🍦😝🤳 @ Snowy Village pic.twitter.com/ZKqlTZkZUK

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ GitHub Universe 2019
item.description:
Uji Time Dessert

After giving my talk, “Don’t be a Robot; automating workflows at scale” at GitHub Universe, I decided to spend some time exploring Japantown in San Francisco, and stumbled upon this place. It is so unique so I decided to get my ice cream there.

Check out Uji Time Dessert for their matcha ice cream and taiyaki cones!

🍦😝🤳 Matcha ice cream with taiyaki cone and red bean topping 🤤
My fanciest #IceCreamSelfie so far! #GitHubUniverse pic.twitter.com/WnJgIuOjsM
